title: Linker: undefined reference to `__morestack'
body:
I'm trying my hands at kernel development in Rust 0.11.0 (so no std, only core and rlibc). I get some linker errors when I try to link the Rust object file:

```
test.o: In function `main':
test.rs:(.text.main+0x20): undefined reference to `__morestack'
test.o: In function `putc::he24536bf2789d594kaa::v0.0.1':
test.rs:(.text._ZN4putc20he24536bf2789d594kaa6v0.0.1E+0x20): undefined reference to `__morestack'
test.o: In function `putchar::h019aa435c983fadcQaa::v0.0.1':
test.rs:(.text._ZN7putchar20h019aa435c983fadcQaa6v0.0.1E+0x20): undefined reference to `__morestack'
test.rs:(.text._ZN7putchar20h019aa435c983fadcQaa6v0.0.1E+0x11e): undefined reference to `failure::fail_bounds_check::hf4a707abcbaa01e27gw::v0.11.0'
test.o: In function `Char::new::h8ef82dbe853a7095Pca::v0.0.1':
test.rs:(.text._ZN4Char3new20h8ef82dbe853a7095Pca6v0.0.1E+0x20): undefined reference to `__morestack'
test.o: In function `rust_begin_unwind':
test.rs:(.text.rust_begin_unwind+0x20): undefined reference to `__morestack'
test.o: In function `begin_unwind::__rust_abi':
test.rs:(.text._ZN12begin_unwind10__rust_abiE+0x20): undefined reference to `__morestack'
```

I put my source code (a single file named `test.rs`) [on Pastebin](http://pastebin.com/GYt2nx64).

I compiled it with these commands, using the Rust 0.11.0 release on Linux Mint 17 x64:

```
rustc  --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -Z no-landing-pads --emit=obj -o test.o test.rs
ld test.o
```

(In reality I'm trying to link the object file with other object files, but that's not relevant here.)
